name: Panther Style
text: You can strike back at enemies who attack you when you move.
prerequisites: Wis 13, Combat Reflexes, Improved Unarmed Strike.
benefit: While using this style, when an opponent makes an attack of opportunity against you for moving through a threatened square, you can spend a swift action to make a retaliatory unarmed strike attack against that opponent. Your attack is resolved after the triggering attack of opportunity.
staminaText: Whenever you provoke an attack of opportunity, you can spend 5 stamina points to make a retaliatory strike as a swift action.
text_zh: 你可以反击那些趁你移步而进犯的敌人。
prerequisites_zh: 感知13，战斗反射，精通徒手打击。
benefit_zh: 当你处于豹拳流派架势时，当你在穿过威胁区域而引发借机攻击时，你能以迅捷动作用徒手反击你的对手。这次攻击在诱发对方借机攻击后才能发动。
staminaText_zh: 当你引发借机攻击时，你可以消耗5点耐力来以迅捷动作做出一次反击。
